Posts.Content: May 27, 2013 09:04PM Wilson6 wrote: No test results tomorrow, but biopsy scheduled... such a long weekend.  Spent it fishing with my son (everyday) and pool parties to keep my mind distracted.  I'm a happy, healthy, married man, father of 4.  41 years old.  Aint got time for for MBC!  My radiologist freaked me out though with with BIRADS 4 (suspicious malignancy).   MBC is so rare.  Just can't process the possibility! But it has been a loooong weekend.  Peace and good luck to all.
Posts.Title: just a shout out to everyone waiting over this long weekend - debmc1958 anastaisa99
